## Welcome to Stumpgrindin' Enterprises
We do things. Check it out.  
(This page is a temporary landing while our permanent home is under construction!)  

## Projects  
Ever wondered how your favorite region stacks up to the size of Texas? See for yourself.  
[BIG OLE TEXAS](http://wokkaflokka.dotgeek.org)  
  
Interested in art, creativity, and collaboration? So are we. Check out our friends at
